file.name: openapi_specification.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    ErrorSchema:
      properties:
        message:
          description: The error message.
          type: string
        type:
          description: The type of error.
          type: string
      required:
      - message
      - type
      type: object
    JSONSchema:
      properties:
        $id:
          type: string
        $schema:
          type: string
        properties:
          type: object
        required:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        title:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
      required:
      - $id
      - $schema
      - required
      - type
      type: object
    JsonSchemaProperty:
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
      required:
      - type
      type: object
    ModelCollectionSchema:
      properties:
        models:
          description: A collection of moodels.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModelSchema'
          type: array
      required:
      - models
      type: object
    ModelMetadataSchema:
      properties:
        description:
          description: The description of the model.
          type: string
        display_name:
          description: The display name of the model.
          type: string
        input_schema:
          allOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/JSONSchema'
          description: The JSON schema of the input of the model.
        major_version:
          description: The major version of the model package.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        minor_version:
          description: The minor version of the model package.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        output_schema:
          allOf:
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/JSONSchema'
          description: The JSON schema of the output of the model.
        qualified_name:
          description: The qualified name of the model.
          type: string
      required:
      - description
      - display_name
      - input_schema
      - major_version
      - minor_version
      - output_schema
      - qualified_name
      type: object
    ModelSchema:
      properties:
        description:
          description: The description of the model.
          type: string
        display_name:
          description: The display name of the model.
          type: string
        major_version:
          description: The major version of the model package.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        minor_version:
          description: The minor version of the model package.
          format: int32
          type: integer
        qualified_name:
          description: The qualified name of the model.
          type: string
      required:
      - description
      - display_name
      - major_version
      - minor_version
      - qualified_name
      type: object
info:
  description: ' A flask application for hosting machine learning models. '
  title: Model Service
  version: 0.1.0
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  /api/models:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModelCollectionSchema'
          description: List of model available
  /api/models/{qualified_name}/metadata:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: The qualified name of the model for which metadata is being requested.
        in: path
        name: qualified_name
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ModelMetadataSchema'
          description: Metadata about one model
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorSchema'
          description: Model not found.
  /api/models/{qualified_name}/predict:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: The qualified name of the model being used for prediction.
        in: path
        name: qualified_name
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Prediction is succesful. The schema of the body of the response
            is described by the model's output schema.
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorSchema'
          description: Input is not valid JSON or does not meet the model's input
            schema.
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorSchema'
          description: Model not found.
        '500':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorSchema'
          description: Server error.
